<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Diluted Hype](/Equipment.aspx?ID=780)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Drug" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=261" />
<trait label="Ingested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Legends](/Sources.aspx?ID=40) pg. 81</row>

**Price** 20 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A synthetic adrenaline supplement that increases awareness and reaction time. Diluted hype has been mixed with saltwater to allow for cheaper mass production.

 **Saving Throw** DC 21 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 1 minute; **Stage 1** [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) and can use the additional action to Step (1 round); **Stage 2** [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) (1 round); **Stage 3** [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) and stupefied 1 (1 round)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Diluted Hype

text: <title level="1" right="Item 5" pfs="Restricted" > Diluted Hype Source Legends pg. 81 Price 20 gp Usage held in 1 hand Bulk L Activate Single Action Interact --- A synthetic adrenaline supplement that increases awareness and reaction time. Diluted hype has been mixed with saltwater to allow for cheaper mass production.
